name: Passing Time Until The End Of Time
name_original: Passing Time Until The End Of Time
description:
Every day feels the same, do your best to live your life.

The controls are up/down, z for select, and x to go back.

A short (less than half an hour) idle game made for Mini Jam 23. The theme was 'time' so I wanted to make a game that was a little bit melancholic.

Feedback is very welcome!
